PositiveEntailmentTest.purpose: Test that violation of separation of the (individual and data value) vocabulary leads to inconsistency
PositiveEntailmentTest.description: The same constant cannot be both an individual and a data value; this leads to inconsistency, and thus "a"="b" is entailed.

PremiseDocument.Presentation:
Document( Prefix(ex <http://example.org/example#>) Prefix(xs <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>) Prefix(rdf <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>)
Import(<http://example.org/mygraph> <http://www.w3.org/ns/entailment/OWL-Direct>)
Group ( ex:myiri[rdf:type -> xs:string] ) )
